_sText:
After doing allot of work on thismap,its finaly done.
it started as the idea to make 36rooms connected to eachother by breakable doors,so that you would notknow where you would end up.
you could encounter some brain hungry zombies or some camping ct's.
or maybe the exit to a higher level.
if you escaped out of the cellar you will reach a small dome with a fortres inside it,inside there you get a great camping spot. 
also some higher grounds that can only be reached by jumping on some boxes.
once you go higher up the map youwill go outdoors,its almost pitchblack except for some streetlanterns.there, you will find some stacked containers wich will have to be jumped if you want to go up top.
once you go down the hill you will reach the street with lots of destroyed cars and trucks,perfect for chases.

i used allot of occluders so you will get good fps
i hd allot of fun making and testing this map,i hope you will enjoy playing it.
if you are an admin from a zombie server please contact me if you are interrested in running my map on his server.
